missionProperties.missionInfo:
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} The neutral mission token is the keycard. After it is dropped, a hero can retrieve the keycard.
{-} A hero carrying the keycard can open the door to the Office.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. 
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Office opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
missionProperties.startingObjective: Open the door to the Office.

events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You are walking through the cantina called Ooze, looking for a sign of your elusive contact. A figure who looks very much like a bounty hunter steps out of the shadows with a blaster drawn.

Doors slam shut. From the looks of things, they're trying to keep you penned in here. You 'll have to find a way out.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Office opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

Breaking through the barricade, you clear a path. Out in the open, you're able to deal with any other hunters trying to claim their share as you get back to your ship.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!

You're very near to breaking free when one of your assailants, whom you thought was incapacitated, pulls out. a thermal detonator. He screams something in an alien tongue as you dive behind whatever cover you can find.

You claw your way free of the wreckage, badly hurt, and signal for extraction. Some of you are more hurt than others, but all told you're lucky to be alive.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The threat level of the next mission (and only the next mission) increases by 2. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 100 credits per hero to prevent this.

One of the Trandoshans appears to be the leader.

{-} Place a neutral mission token under the Trandoshan Hunter on Tile 27B. He is carrying the keycard.
{-} The neutral mission token is the keycard. After it is dropped, a hero can retrieve the keycard.
{-} A hero carrying the keycard can open the door to the Office.

One of the Trandoshans appears to be the leader.

{-} Place a neutral mission token under the Trandoshan Hunter on Tile 26B. He is carrying the keycard.
{-} The neutral mission token is the keycard. After it is dropped, a hero can retrieve the keycard.
{-} A hero carrying the keycard can open the door to the Office.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
This is the door to the store room.

The door is locked.

events.eventText:
The door opens, only to reveal a frightful sight: The mechanical silhouette of the fearsome droid bounty hunter IG-88, accompanied by a flying combat drone.

{-} The door to the Store Room is now unlocked.
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to open the door to the exit. At the end of each Round, the door to the exit closes.
{-} Imperial mission tokens are barricades. Barricades are blocking terrain and can be attacked (Health: *3*, Defense: 1 {G}).

translatedEntityProperties.theText: This is the door to the store room.

This is the door to the Office.

The door is locked. A hero carrying the keycard can open the door to the Office.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to open the door to the exit. At the end of each Round, the door to the exit closes.
{-} Imperial mission tokens are barricades. Barricades are blocking terrain and can be attacked (Health: *3*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. 
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Exit opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.shortText: Open the door to the Exit.

events.eventText: The door to the exit slams shut.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
This is the door to the exit.

A hero can interact with the terminal ({I)}) to open the door to the exit. At the end of each Round, the door to the exit closes.

events.eventText: The door to the exit slides open.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
This is the door to the exit.

A hero can interact with the terminal ({I)}) to open the door to the exit. At the end of each Round, the door to the exit closes.

events.eventText:
Behind the door lies a small back alley. You can see a way to escape from here.

{-} The Rebel mission token represents the exit. When all heroes are on or adjacent to the exit, the heroes depart, ending the mission.

eventActions.theText:
{-} A hero can interact with the terminal ({I)}) to open the door to the exit. At the end of each Round, the door to the exit closes.
{-} Imperial mission tokens are barricades. Barricades are blocking terrain and can be attacked (Health: *3*, Defense: 1 {G}).
{-} The Rebel mission token represents the exit. When all heroes are on or adjacent to the exit, the heroes depart, ending the mission.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move. 
{-} The Rebels win the mission when they depart.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: The barricade is reduced to splinters under your attacks.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door to the exit is barricaded.

Barricades are blocking terrain and can be attacked (Health: *3*, Defense: 1 {G}).

events.eventText: The barricade is reduced to splinters under your attacks.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The door to the exit is barricaded.

Barricades are blocking terrain and can be attacked (Health: *3*, Defense: 1 {G}).

mapEntities.mainText:
This is the door to the store room.

The door is locked.

This is the door to the Office.

The door is locked. A hero carrying the keycard can open the door to the Office.

This is the door to the exit.

A hero can interact with the terminal ({I)}) to open the door to the exit. At the end of each Round, the door to the exit closes.

This is the exit.

When all heroes are on or adjacent to the exit, the heroes depart, ending the mission.

This terminal controls the exit door, but its security measures make sure it won't stay open for long.

A hero can interact with the terminal ({I}) to open the door to the exit. At the end of each Round, the door to the exit closes.

The door to the exit is barricaded.

Barricades are blocking terrain and can be attacked (Health: *3*, Defense: 1 {G}).

The door to the exit is barricaded.

Barricades are blocking terrain and can be attacked (Health: *3*, Defense: 1 {G}).
